definition[0]: a painting, drawing, or photograph of a person
example[1]: the artist’s portrait of his mother
example[2]: She’s been commissioned to paint Jackson’s portrait.
definition[1]: a description or representation of something
example[3]: a portrait of working life in America
definition[2]: if a piece of paper, a page, a photograph etc is in a portrait position, it is placed on a surface or hung on a wall with its longer edges at the sides
